gpt.prompt:
Hey you tell me short story

Once upon a time, there was a young girl named Sarah who lived in a small village. She had no friends and felt very lonely. One day, while walking through the woods, she stumbled upon an old man sitting by a campfire. He welcomed her warmly and offered her some food and drink. They talked for hours about life and Sarah soon found herself feeling more connected to this kind stranger than anyone else she had ever met before. From that day forward, they became fast friends and Sarah was never lonely again.
